name: That Pub On The Trail
description:
Welcome to that pub on the trail, an abandoned pub left to rot after it's previous landlord was involved with some unspeakable acts. What was seemingly an empty pub was in fact inhabited by its previous owner. Now you, the player, must gather items together and avoid her gaze in order to create a makeshift ram and open the door to freedom.                 Controls:

WASD - Move

F - Torch/Flashlight

E - Pickup Objects

Note: You must be touching an object in order to pick it up
